title: 692 - As Fair as a State Fair
description:
Some musings about butter sculptures, history and a roller coaster called love.

(If you skip the intro to support the podcast you can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:00)
